page.description: The <OBJECT>.LEFT() method moves the focus to the left as if the user had pressed the "Left" key.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.left()
